item.title: Report E-2024090005
item.description:
Report E-2024090005

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: JESSUP
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XJP notified ERTS of a damaged 400 pound drum of UN1807 Phosphorus Pentoxide that was just picked up from a customer. XPO personnel noticed the drum had a small puncture at the bottom upon arrival. The drum lost a small amount of material, but the spill did not happen at their terminal or in the trailer, per XPO, and they confirmed the drum was not actively leaking. ERTS dispatched contractors to assist with overpacking, however XPO terminal personnel overpacked the damaged drum. The drum was held at XPO's terminal pending disposition.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PICKOFF NOTICED WET HAZMAT, STOPPED PROGRESS, LEFT AREA AND NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. RESPONDER WAS CALLED AND RESPONDED IN FULL PPE WITH DECISION TREE. FOLLOWING PROPER RESPONSE SHEET LEAKER WAS CLEANED UP AND BROUGHT TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024082078
item.description:
Report X-2024082078

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-04T09:14:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-17
  • City: ELKRIDGE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clayton Kurth, 048 Service Center Manager, contacted Safety regarding a drum that has liquid on top of the lid. Clayton Kurth advised being unsure if the liquid on top of the metal drum is UN2790. Clayton Kurth also stated no marks or damages found on the drum. Safety advised contacting Cura for rem ediation, and asked if the spill was contained to clean on straight time. Clayton Kurth advised the spill is contained. Safety contacted Alex VerHagen with Cura for remediation.
